mireka.filter.local.table

Class SplitRecipientSpecification

  • Object
    • mireka.filter.local.table.SplitRecipientSpecification
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RecipientSpecification

    public class SplitRecipientSpecification
extends Object
implements RecipientSpecification
    SplitRecipientSpecification matches a recipient if its remote part matches the supplied RemotePartSpecification and its local part matches the supplied LocalPartSpecification. This specification never matches the global Postmaster address, because that has no remote part.
